taibaSection.text: Taíba is a peaceful place with great waves

testimonies.quote: We came from São Paulo to have this wonderful experience at NaBoa Surf Camp! Professor Caio led all our lessons (three days in a row) with great care and patience, which resulted in incredible progress. Highly recommend — I plan to return!
testimonies.name: Victoria
testimonies.title: Beginner Surfer

testimonies.quote: Amazing experience, I highly recommend! Kaio is an excellent instructor and made me feel comfortable and safe during my first surf lesson. He has great technique and teaching skills — very patient and knowledgeable.
testimonies.name: Maria Oliveira
testimonies.title: Intermediate Surfer

testimonies.quote: I take surf lessons in Fortaleza and had a private lesson with Caio that was a game changer — a wonderful experience. He teaches calmly and with excellent technique. I'll book more lessons this holiday to keep improving.
testimonies.name: Carlos Pereira
testimonies.title: Advanced Surfer

testimonies.quote: Fantastic welcome — Kaio is a great guy who provided full support. They offer board rentals, know the local breaks and the best spots for your session! I'll be back often. P.S. They also do photo and video sessions.
testimonies.name: Ana Costa
testimonies.title: Enthusiast Surfer

testimonies.quote: An incredible experience with a very welcoming team, comfortable service and accommodations — everyone makes the atmosphere wonderfully light, comfortable and special. I highly recommend!
testimonies.name: Lucas Fernandes
testimonies.title: Beginner Surfer

testimonies.quote: Amazing place in Taíba. Great energy, great people and a very welcoming vibe. Highly recommended!
testimonies.name: Lucas Fernandes
testimonies.title: Beginner Surfer

testimonies.quote: Cozy environment. Very helpful staff. I'll be back soon.
testimonies.name: Lucas Fernandes
testimonies.title: Beginner Surfer

kiteSection.text: If you already practice kitesurf, come learn to surf with us in Taíba, one of the best spots in Brazil.

question1.title: Do I need to know how to surf to take a surf lesson?
question1.answer: No — our surf lessons are designed for all levels, from complete beginners to advanced surfers. Our experienced instructors will adapt the lesson to your needs and abilities.

question2.title: Do I need to have my own equipment for lessons?
question2.answer: No — we provide all necessary equipment for surf lessons. However, if you have your own board or gear, feel free to bring it.

question3.title: How do I book a lesson or package?
question3.answer: You can book a lesson or package directly through our website by contacting us via email or phone.

question4.title: Where can I stay during my visit?
question4.answer: We have partnerships with local accommodations and can help recommend places to stay during your visit.
